name: Brave 0.12.3
notes: Added importing from other browsers. Added extension enhancements including auto-update, post-install downloads. Various fixes for Brave Payments, geolocation, toolbar, autofill, history, address bar, and per-site settings. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.3dev

name: Brave 0.12.1
notes: Added many languages. Added extension UI. Various fixes for Brave Payments, history, and password manager extensions. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/0.12.1dev

name: Brave 0.12.0
notes: Added option to allow for mixed-content. Added shortcut to view source. Various fixes for autofill, bookmarks, and history. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/0.12.0dev

name: Brave 0.11.6
notes: Added the ability to pay publishers with the Brave Ledger. Added autofill, bookmarks enhancements, find bar design update, and history. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/0.11.6dev

name: Brave 0.11.5
notes: Stability and minor bug fixes. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.5dev

name: Brave 0.11.4
notes: More data clearing options, tab page previews, printing fix on Windows, memory leak fixes, crash fixes and more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.4dev

name: Brave 0.11.3
notes: PDF, zoom, URL bar fixes, and libchromiumcontent 52.0.2743.116. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.3dev

name: Brave 0.11.2
notes: Long tap history on back button, search shortcuts like 'yt cat videos', tab and nav cloning,  and much more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.2dev

name: Brave 0.11.1
notes: PDF viewing, more data clearing options, navigator.registerProtocolHandler support, copy image option and more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.1dev

name: Brave 0.11.0
notes: LastPass support, WebRTC fingerprinting protection, Flash click to play if Flash is enabled, and more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.0dev

name: Brave 0.10.4
notes: Autocomplete, new suggestions UX, experimental Flash support and more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/v0.10.4dev

name: Brave 0.10.3
notes: Update to libchromiumcontent 51.0.2704.84

name: Brave 0.10.2
notes: Crash fix for Windows with some link types.

name: Brave 0.10.1
notes: Fingerprint protection in the Bravery panel and various fixes. Full notes: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/v0.10.1dev

name: Brave 0.10.0
notes: Per site Bravery panel, error pages, and much more. Full detail: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.10.0dev

name: Brave 0.9.6
notes: Chromium 50.0.2661.102 and various bug fixes. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.9.6dev

name: Brave 0.9.5
notes: Spell check, script blocking similar to NoScript, and much more. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.9.5dev

name: Brave 0.9.4
notes: Startup fix if profile dir does not exist

name: Brave 0.9.3
notes: Dashlane support, external protocol handling, permission prompts, Chromium 50.0.2661.86, and more

name: Brave 0.9.2
notes: Windows 32-bit support, Windows default browser handling, fingerprinting protection, zoom fixes, multi language support, printing fix, and more. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.9.2dev
